title: Breakingviews TV: Chip chopped
text:
Breakingviews TV: Chip chopped Tuesday, March 13, 2018 - 03:37 
Politics may explain the White House’s block on Broadcom’s $117 bln bid for Qualcomm – but that doesn’t mean future deal-doers can’t avoid some of the acquisitive chipmaker’s gaffes, as Robert Cyran tells John Foley. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Politics may explain the White House’s block on Broadcom’s $117 bln bid for Qualcomm – but that doesn’t mean future deal-doers can’t avoid some of the acquisitive chipmaker’s gaffes, as Robert Cyran tells John Foley.
